08-15-2024: - Added a sound for movement being restricted by {AbilityIcon|Ability=Slowing Hex|Size=20} Slowing Hex and Vindicta tether
- Debuff no longer cancels active mobility spells, it only prevents them from being casted
- Now also reduces stamina distance by 30%
06-27-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Quantum Entanglement|Size=20} Quantum Entanglement is prevented from being cast when Dynamo is rooted or movement-silenced (such as by Slowing Hex)
